trans-unit.source: Specifies whether device font substitution is enabled on a printer.
trans-unit.target: Angir om enheten skrift erstatningen er aktivert for en skriver.

trans-unit.source: Printing is faster when only the text, not the font, is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Utskrift er raskere når bare tekst, og ikke skriften, sendes til skriveren.

trans-unit.source: Some printers have fonts that are permanently stored in their memory.
trans-unit.target: Noen skrivere har skrifter som lagres permanent i et minne.

trans-unit.source: These printers enable users to substitute a resident printer font for each font that is used by the printing application.
trans-unit.target: Disse skriverne kan brukere erstatter faste for hver skriften som brukes av programmet utskrift.

trans-unit.source: The values of this type are used primarily for these purposes: - As members of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability%2A> collection, a property of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>, they represent the printer capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene for denne typen brukes først og fremst for dette formålet: – som medlemmer av den <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability%2A>samling, en egenskap for <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>, de representerer Skriverfunksjoner.</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities.DeviceFontSubstitutionCapability%2A>

trans-unit.source: - As the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.DeviceFontSubstitution%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>, they instruct the printer to enable or disable device font substitution for the print job.
trans-unit.target: -Som verdien for den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.DeviceFontSubstitution%2A>for en <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>, de be skriveren for å aktivere eller deaktivere enheten skrifterstatning for utskriftsjobben.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.DeviceFontSubstitution%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Unknown value is never used in properties of <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> objects.
trans-unit.target: Ukjent verdi aldri er brukt i Egenskaper for <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>objekter.</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: You should never set a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> property to Unknown.

If some other <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> producing application has created a PrintTicket document that sets the device font substitution feature to an unrecognized option (that is, an option that is not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), then a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> object in your application that is constructed with that document will have Unknown as the value of the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.DeviceFontSubstitution%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis noen andre <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>produserer applikasjonen er opprettet et PrintTicket-dokument som angir funksjonen enheten skrift erstatning for et ugjenkjennelig alternativ (som er et alternativ som ikke er definert i den [Skriv ut skjemaet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397)), og deretter en <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>objektet i programmet som er laget med dette dokumentet har ukjent som verdien for den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.DeviceFontSubstitution%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket.DeviceFontSubstitution%2A> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> and <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> or <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> classes.
trans-unit.target: Selv om den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>og <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>klasser kan arves, kan du utvide den [skrive ut skjemaet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) ikke gjenkjenne skriver funksjoner som ikke blir inkludert i den <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>eller <xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities>klasser.</xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintCapabilities> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NOTINBUILD: How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NOTINBUILD: slik: utvide Skriv ut skjemaet og opprette nye utskrift systemklasser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/a3600218-1ea5-478a-9853-6560464f2885).

trans-unit.source: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the [Print Schema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
trans-unit.target: Funksjonen (alternativer som er representert av denne opplisting) er satt til et alternativ som ikke er definert i den [Skriv ut skjemaet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397).
